title: Real Medals for ranked end of season? merchandise idea.
body:
i was just thinking the other day, people get trophies and medallions for sports etc. and league has a kind of medallion for each rank in ranked play. so what if at the end of the season whatever rank you finish it gives you access to purchase a medallion that looks the same as your ranked division medal? 

now obviously its not going to be made out of bronze/silver/gold/plat/diamond/er .. master.? etc and the diamond ranks could be hard due to the clear parts but i feel it could easily be done and the gems could just be plastic or glass.

i know id be ordering one at the end of season thats for sure! thoughts?

replies.body:

 I belive they already have them{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

thats cool although just being able to buy any one you want takes away from the medal part and actually earning it! also looks like its just some random person making them and not riot haha.

the really important part to me is only being able to purchase the medal you actually ranked to =)
